item.description:
In preparation for Shavuot, we will take a meditative hike up Mt. Watatic that will include stops along the way for prayer, song, and meditative kavvanot, or intentions. We'll share a potluck picnic lunch at the top, along with a Torah discussion, and then make our way back down. Bring your camera, a reading, or a story to share in the spirit of receiving Torah.

Due to the weather forecast this event is being changed to Wachusett Reservoir Audubon Sanctuary in Princeton MA. Please call if you want to join us.

Trip's Coordinator: Rabbi Katy Z. Allen,

Staff Chaplain, Brigham and Women's Hospital

Rabbi, Ma'yan Tikvah by email: rabbikza@verizon.net

Meet: Meet at 10:30 in the Parking Lot at Mt. Watatic

There is no charge for attending this event
item.how_to_find_us: If you need more information contact Rabbi Allen

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: To the Mountaintop: Preparing for Shavuot
